TEXT.French: Created by Archid Mod.
TEXT.German: Erstellt durch Archid Mod.
TEXT.Italian: Creato dal Archid Mod.
TEXT.Spanish: Created by Archid Mod.

TEXT.French: Base Production
TEXT.German: Grundproduktion
TEXT.Italian: Produzione base
TEXT.Spanish: Producción Base

TEXT.English: When checked, shows base production (excludes overflow, whipping, and chopping) in addition to the current turn's production.
TEXT.French: When checked, shows base production (excludes overflow, whipping, and chopping) in addition to the current turn's production.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Grundproduktion (ohne Überschuss, Zwangsarbeit und Waldrodung) zusätzlich zur Produktion der derzeitigen Runde an
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra la produzione base (escluse le quote da surplus, sacrifici e abbattimento alberi) come aggiunta alla produzione del turno corrente.
TEXT.Spanish: Muestra la producción base (excluyendo excedentes, sacrificios y tala) además de la producción del turno actual.

TEXT.French: Base Values
TEXT.German: Basiswerte
TEXT.Italian: Valori base
TEXT.Spanish: Valores Base

TEXT.English: When checked, holding CTRL while hovering shows the base (without modifiers) values for most items: production, trade, commerce, maintenance, great people.
TEXT.French: When checked, holding CTRL while hovering shows the base (without modifiers) values for most items: production, trade, commerce, maintenance, great people.
TEXT.German: Zeigt, wenn der Mauszeiger bei gedrückter [STRG]-Taste über eine Stadt bewegt wird, die Basiswerte (ohne Modifikatoren) der folgenden Güter an: Produktion, Handel, Wirtschaft, Unterhalt, Große Persönlichkeiten
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, tenendo premuto CTRL mentre si posiziona il cursore su un oggetto ne mostra i valori base (privi di modificatori) di produzione, oro, commercio, mantenimento, grandi personaggi.
TEXT.Spanish: Si se activa, mantener Ctrl mientras se mantiene el ratón sobre un valor mostrará el valor sin modificaciones para la mayoría de valores: producción, comercio, oro, mantenimiento, grandes personas.

TEXT.French: Building Icons
TEXT.German: Gebäude-Symbole
TEXT.Italian: Icone di edifici
TEXT.Spanish: Iconos de Construcción

TEXT.English: When checked, the list of buildings is shown using icons instead of their names.
TEXT.French: When checked, the list of buildings is shown using icons instead of their names.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Liste der Gebäude mit Symbolen statt Text an
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, la lista degli edifici viene visualizzata con le rispettive icone invece dei nomi.
TEXT.Spanish: Si se activa, se muestra la lista de edificios empleando iconos en lugar de nombres.

TEXT.French: Commerce
TEXT.German: Wirtschaft
TEXT.Italian: Oro
TEXT.Spanish: Comercio

TEXT.English: When checked, the total commerce ([ICON_COMMERCE]) is shown before the individual commerce types ([ICON_GOLD], [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_CULTURE], and [ICON_ESPIONAGE]).
TEXT.French: When checked, the total commerce ([ICON_COMMERCE]) is shown before the individual commerce types ([ICON_GOLD], [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_CULTURE], and [ICON_ESPIONAGE]).
TEXT.German: Zeigt das gesamte Wirtschaftseinkommen ([ICON_COMMERCE]) vor den einzelnen Einkommensarten ([ICON_GOLD], [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_CULTURE] und [ICON_ESPIONAGE]) an
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra l'oro totale ([ICON_COMMERCE]) prima dei singoli tipi ([ICON_GOLD], [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_CULTURE], e [ICON_ESPIONAGE]).
TEXT.Spanish: Muestra el comercio total ([ICON_COMMERCE]) delante de cada uno de los tipos de comercio individuales ([ICON_GOLD], [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_CULTURE], y [ICON_ESPIONAGE]).

TEXT.French: Culture Turns
TEXT.German: Kultur
TEXT.Italian: Turni culturali
TEXT.Spanish: Turnos de Cultura

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the number of turns until the city's borders expand due to culture ([ICON_CULTURE]).
TEXT.French: When checked, shows the number of turns until the city's borders expand due to culture ([ICON_CULTURE]).
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Anzahl der Runden an, bis sich die Kulturgrenzen ([ICON_CULTURE]) einer Stadt erweitern
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra il numero di turni mancanti per la successiva espansione culturale ([ICON_CULTURE]).
TEXT.Spanish: Si se activa, muestra el número de turnos restantes para que los bordes de la ciudad se expandan debido a su cultura ([ICON_CULTURE]).

TEXT.French: Draft Anger
TEXT.German: Zwangsrekrutierung
TEXT.Italian: Rabbia da coscrizione
TEXT.Spanish: Infelicidad por Reclutamiento

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the number of angry population ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) due to drafting and the number of turns left on the timer.
TEXT.French: When checked, shows the number of angry population ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) due to drafting and the number of turns left on the timer.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Anzahl der wegen Zwangsrekrutierung unzufriedenen Bürger ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) und die Anzahl der verbleibenden Runden an, bis diese sich wieder beruhigt haben
TEXT.Italian: When checked, shows the number of angry population ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) due to drafting and the number of turns left on the timer.
TEXT.Spanish: Muestra la cantidad de población enfadada ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) debido al reclutamiento y el número de turnos restantes de la misma.

TEXT.French: Growth Detail
TEXT.German: Wachstum
TEXT.Italian: Crescita dettagliata
TEXT.Spanish: Detalles de Crecimiento

TEXT.English: When checked, shows more detailed information about growth (growing, shrinking, starvation, stagnation).
TEXT.French: When checked, shows more detailed information about growth (growing, shrinking, starvation, stagnation).
TEXT.German: Zeigt detailliertere Informationen über das Wachstum einer Stadt an (Zunahme, Abnahme, Hungersnot, Stagnation).
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra più dettagli sulla crescita (crescita, decrescita, carestia, stagnazione).
TEXT.Spanish: Si se activa, muestra información detallada sobre el crecimiento (creciendo, reduciéndose, hambruna, detenido).

TEXT.French: Great Person Turns
TEXT.German: Große Persönlichkeiten
TEXT.Italian: Turni dei Grandi Personaggi
TEXT.Spanish: Turnos de Gran Personaje

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the number of turns until the city will create the next great person ([ICON_GREATPEOPLE]).
TEXT.French: When checked, shows the number of turns until the city will create the next great person ([ICON_GREATPEOPLE]).
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Anzahl der Runden an, bis eine Stadt eine Große Persönlichkeit ([ICON_GREATPEOPLE]) hervorbringt
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra il numero di turni necessario perchè la città generi il successivo Grande Personaggio([ICON_GREATPEOPLE]).
TEXT.Spanish: Si se activa, muestra el número de turnos restantes para que en la ciudad nazca una gran personaje ([ICON_GREATPEOPLE]).

TEXT.French: Happiness
TEXT.German: Zufriedenheit
TEXT.Italian: Felicità
TEXT.Spanish: Felicidad

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the net happiness ([ICON_HAPPY] or [ICON_UNHAPPY]) for the city.
TEXT.French: When checked, shows the net happiness ([ICON_HAPPY] or [ICON_UNHAPPY]) for the city.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die derzeitige Zufriedenheit ([ICON_HAPPY] oder [ICON_UNHAPPY]) einer Stadt an
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra la felicità risultante ([ICON_HAPPY] o [ICON_UNHAPPY]) per la città.
TEXT.Spanish: Permite mostrar los iconos de felicidad ([ICON_HAPPY] o [ICON_UNHAPPY]) para la ciudad.

TEXT.French: Health
TEXT.German: Gesundheit
TEXT.Italian: Salute
TEXT.Spanish: Salud

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the net health ([ICON_HEALTHY] or [ICON_UNHEALTHY]) for the city.
TEXT.French: When checked, shows the net health ([ICON_HEALTHY] or [ICON_UNHEALTHY]) for the city.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die derzeitige Gesundheit ([ICON_HEALTHY] oder [ICON_UNHEALTHY]) einer Stadt an
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra la salute risultante([ICON_HEALTHY] o [ICON_UNHEALTHY]) per la città.
TEXT.Spanish: Permite mostrar los iconos de salud ([ICON_HEALTHY] o [ICON_UNHEALTHY]) para la ciudad.

TEXT.French: Hide Instructions
TEXT.German: Hinweise verbergen
TEXT.Italian: Nascondi Istruzioni
TEXT.Spanish: Ocultar Instrucciones

TEXT.English: When checked, hides the instructions for selecting cities and showing base values to make room for the new information.
TEXT.French: When checked, hides the instructions for selecting cities and showing base values to make room for the new information.
TEXT.German: Verbirgt die Hinweise zur Auswahl von Städten und zur Anzeige der Basiswerte, um Platz für die neuen Informationen zu schaffen
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, nasconde le istruzioni per la selezione delle Città e mostra i valori base per fare posto alle nuove informazioni.
TEXT.Spanish: Si se activa, se ocultan las instrucciones para seleccionar ciudades y mostrar valores base para hacer sitio a más información.

TEXT.French: Hurry Anger
TEXT.German: Zwangsarbeit
TEXT.Italian: Rabbia da sacrifici
TEXT.Spanish: Infelicidad por Sacrificio

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the number of angry population ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) due to whipping and the number of turns left on the timer.
TEXT.French: When checked, shows the number of angry population ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) due to whipping and the number of turns left on the timer.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Anzahl der wegen Zwangsarbeit unzufriedenen Bürger ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) und die Anzahl der verbleibenden Runden an, bis diese sich wieder beruhigt haben
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra il numero di cittadini adirati ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) a causa dei sacrifici ed il numero di turni prima che si pacifichino.
TEXT.Spanish: Muestra la cantidad de población enfadada ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) debido al sacrificio y el número de turnos restantes de la misma.

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the cost ([ICON_CITIZEN] or [ICON_GOLD]) and overflow ([ICON_PRODUCTION] and [ICON_GOLD]) for hurrying (whip and/or buy) the item being produced.
TEXT.French: When checked, shows the cost ([ICON_CITIZEN] or [ICON_GOLD]) and overflow ([ICON_PRODUCTION] and [ICON_GOLD]) for hurrying (whip and/or buy) the item being produced.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Kosten ([ICON_CITIZEN] oder [ICON_GOLD]) und Überschüsse ([ICON_PRODUCTION] und [ICON_GOLD]) einer Beschleunigung (Zwangsarbeit und/oder Kauf) der derzeitigen Produktion an
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra il costo ([ICON_CITIZEN] o [ICON_GOLD]) ed il surplus ([ICON_PRODUCTION] e [ICON_GOLD]) per l'accelerazione (da sacrifici e/o pagamenti) per l'oggetto in produzione.
TEXT.Spanish: Si se activa, muestra el coste ([ICON_CITIZEN] o [ICON_GOLD]) y excedente ([ICON_PRODUCTION] y [ICON_GOLD]) por apresurar (sacrificio y/o compra) la producción actual.

TEXT.French: Include Current
TEXT.German: Aktuelle Runde einbeziehen
TEXT.Italian: Includi corrente
TEXT.Spanish: Incluir Actual

TEXT.English: When checked, includes the current turn's production when calculating overflow ([ICON_PRODUCTION] and/or [ICON_GOLD]) from hurrying with the whip.
TEXT.French: When checked, includes the current turn's production when calculating overflow ([ICON_PRODUCTION] and/or [ICON_GOLD]) from hurrying with the whip.
TEXT.German: Bezieht [ICON_PRODUCTION] einer Stadt aus der aktuellen Runde in die Berechnung des Produktionsüberschusses ([ICON_PRODUCTION] und/oder [ICON_GOLD]) ein, der aus der Produktionsbeschleunigung durch Zwangsarbeit entsteht
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, include il turno corrente quando calcola il surplus ([ICON_PRODUCTION] e/o [ICON_GOLD]) per l'accelerazione da sacrifici.
TEXT.Spanish: Si se activa, incluye la producción del turno actual cuando se calcule el excedente ([ICON_PRODUCTION] y/o [ICON_GOLD]) de apresurar construcción mediante sacrificio.

TEXT.French: Revolt Chance
TEXT.German: Unruhe-Wahrscheinlichkeit
TEXT.Italian: Possibilità di Rivolta
TEXT.Spanish: Probabilidad de Revuelta

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the probability that the city will revolt due to cultural pressure.
TEXT.French: When checked, shows the probability that the city will revolt due to cultural pressure.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Wahrscheinlichkeit an, dass in einer Stadt auf Grund von kulturellem Druck Unruhen ausbrechen
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra la probabilità che la Città si rivolti a causa della pressione culturale.
TEXT.Spanish: Si se activa, muestra las probabilidades de que tenga lugar una revuelta en la ciudad debido a la presión cultural.

TEXT.French: Specialists
TEXT.German: Spezialisten
TEXT.Italian: Specialisti
TEXT.Spanish: Especialistas

TEXT.English: When checked, shows icons for the city's specialists (both citizens and settled great people).
TEXT.French: When checked, shows icons for the city's specialists (both citizens and settled great people).
TEXT.German: Zeigt Symbole für die Spezialisten einer Stadt ab (sowohl für Bürger als auch für niedergelassene Große Persönlichkeiten)
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra delle icone per gli Specialisti in città (sia i Cittadini Specialisti che i Grandi Personaggi trasformati in Super-Specialisti).
TEXT.Spanish: Si se activa, muestra iconos para los especialistas de la ciudad (tanto ciudadanos como grandes personajes).

TEXT.French: Trade
TEXT.German: Handel
TEXT.Italian: Commercio
TEXT.Spanish: Comercio

TEXT.English: When checked, shows breakdowns for trade: total, foreign, and foreign overseas. Each includes those after it: foreign includes foreign overseas, and total includes both foreign and foreign overseas.
TEXT.French: When checked, shows breakdowns for trade: total, foreign, and foreign overseas. Each includes those after it: foreign includes foreign overseas, and total includes both foreign and foreign overseas.
TEXT.German: Zeigt eine Aufschlüsselung des Handels in "Gesamt", "Ausland" und "Übersee" an, wobei der Wert für "Ausland" jenen für "Übersee" einschließt und "Gesamt" wiederum beide Werte in sich vereint
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra dei subtotali per il commercio: totale, estero, ed oltremare. Quello estero include quello d'oltremare, e quello totale include entrambi.
TEXT.Spanish: Activar esta opción muestra detalles para el comercio: total, exterior y ultramar. Cada valor incluye a los anteriores.

TEXT.French: Turns to Starvation
TEXT.German: Runden bis Hungersnot
TEXT.Italian: Turns to Starvation
TEXT.Spanish: Turnos hasta Hambruna

TEXT.English: When checked, shows how many turns until a city will lose population if it is shrinking.
TEXT.French: When checked, shows how many turns until a city will lose population if it is shrinking.
TEXT.German: Zeigt an, in wie vielen Runden eine Stadt einen Bürger verliert, falls ihre Bevölkerung schrumpft
TEXT.Italian: When checked, shows how many turns until a city will lose population if it is shrinking.
TEXT.Spanish: Muestra cuántos turnos faltan para que una ciudad pierda población.

TEXT.German: Bearbeitbares Gebiet hervorheben

TEXT.English: When checked, highlights the area of tiles controlled by the selected city, similar to when you select a Settler.
TEXT.German: Hebt die von der gewählten Stadt bearbeitbaren Geländefelder hervor (ähnlich wie bei Auswahl eines Siedlers)
Modernisierbares Gebiet hervorheben

TEXT.English: When checked, highlights each tile controlled by the selected city using a color based on whether it's being worked and your ability to improve it.
TEXT.German: Hebt die von der gewählten Stadt bearbeitbaren Geländefelder mit farbigen Markierungen hervor, abhängig von der tatsächlichen Bewirtschaftung und den Möglichkeiten zur Modernisierung
Modernisiert

TEXT.English: When checked, highlights tiles being worked that have already been improved.
TEXT.German: Hebt Geländefelder hervor, die bearbeitet werden und schon modernisiert wurden

TEXT.English: Highlight colour of tiles being worked that have already been improved.
Highlight colour alpha value of tiles being worked that have already been improved.

TEXT.German: Modernisierbar

TEXT.English: When checked, highlights tiles being worked that can be improved.
TEXT.German: Hebt Geländefelder hervor, die bearbeitet werden und noch modernisiert werden können

TEXT.English: Highlight colour of tiles being worked that can be improved.
Highlight colour alpha value of tiles being worked that can be improved.

TEXT.German: Modernisierbar mit Bonus

TEXT.English: When checked, highlights tiles being worked that can be improved to provide a bonus.
TEXT.German: Hebt Geländefelder hervor, die bearbeitet werden und modernisiert werden können, um einen Bonus zu erhalten

TEXT.English: Highlight colour of tiles being worked that can be improved to provide a bonus.
Highlight colour alpha value of tiles being worked that can be improved to provide a bonus.

TEXT.German: Nicht modernisierbar

TEXT.English: When checked, highlights tiles being worked that cannot be improved.
TEXT.German: Hebt Geländefelder hervor, die bearbeitet werden und nicht modernisiert werden können

TEXT.English: Highlight colour of tiles being worked that cannot be improved.
Highlight colour alpha value of tiles being worked that cannot be improved.

TEXT.German: Modernisiert

TEXT.English: When checked, highlights tiles not being worked that have already been improved.
TEXT.German: Hebt Geländefelder hervor, die nicht bearbeitet werden und schon modernisiert wurden

TEXT.English: Highlight colour of tiles not being worked that have already been improved.
Highlight colour alpha value of tiles not being worked that have already been improved.

TEXT.German: Modernisierbar

TEXT.English: When checked, highlights tiles not being worked that can be improved.
TEXT.German: Hebt Geländefelder hervor, die nicht bearbeitet werden und noch modernisiert werden können

TEXT.English: Highlight colour of tiles not being worked that can be improved.
Highlight colour alpha value of tiles not being worked that can be improved.

TEXT.German: Modernisierbar mit Bonus

TEXT.English: When checked, highlights tiles not being worked that can be improved to provide a bonus.
TEXT.German: Hebt Geländefelder hervor, die nicht bearbeitet werden und modernisiert werden können, um einen Bonus zu erhalten

TEXT.English: Highlight colour of tiles not being worked that can be improved to provide a bonus.
Highlight colour alpha value of tiles not being worked that can be improved to provide a bonus.

TEXT.German: Nicht modernisierbar

TEXT.English: When checked, highlights tiles not being worked that cannot be improved.
TEXT.German: Hebt Geländefelder hervor, die nicht bearbeitet werden und nicht modernisiert werden können

TEXT.English: Highlight colour of tiles not being worked that cannot be improved.
Highlight colour alpha value of tiles not being worked that cannot be improved.

TEXT.French: Sentry While Healing
TEXT.German: Wache bei Heilung
TEXT.Italian: Sentinella durante la guarigione
TEXT.Spanish: Sentry While Healing

TEXT.English: When checked, units ordered to heal will awaken when they spot danger, acting like sentries.
TEXT.French: When checked, units ordered to heal will awaken when they spot danger, acting like sentries.
TEXT.German: Veranlasst Einheiten, die sich gerade heilen, bei Gefahr aktiv zu werden
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, le Unità che hanno ricevuto l'ordine di curarsi si riattiveranno quando avvertono un pericolo, fungendo da sentinelle.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, units ordered to heal will awaken when they spot danger, acting like sentries.

TEXT.French: Only Neutral Territory
TEXT.German: Nur in neutralem Gebiet
TEXT.Italian: Solo in territorio neutrale
TEXT.Spanish: Only Neutral Territory

TEXT.English: When checked, if Sentry While Healing is enabled, units will awaken to danger only when in neutral territory. This stops your attacking force from waking up each turn outside an enemy city or your defenders inside friendly territory.
TEXT.French: When checked, if Sentry While Healing is enabled, units will awaken to danger only when in neutral territory. This stops your attacking force from waking up each turn outside an enemy city or your defenders inside friendly territory.
TEXT.German: Falls die Option "Wache bei Heilung" gewählt wurde, werden Einheiten nur bei Gefahr aktiv, wenn sie sich in neutralem Gebiet befinden (verhindert beispielsweise, dass sich heilende Einheiten während eines Angriffs auf eine feindliche Stadt oder verteidigende Einheiten in befreundetem Gebiet jede Runde wieder aktiv werden)
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, se è stata abilitata l'opzione 'Sentinella durante la guarigione', le Unità che hanno ricevuto l'ordine di curarsi si riattiveranno quando avvertono un pericolo solamente se si trovano in territorio neutrale. Ciò vi eviterà alle vostre forze d'attacco di attivarsi ogni turno in prossimità di una Città nemica ed alle vostre forze di difesa di riattivarsi in territorio nemico.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, if Sentry While Healing is enabled, units will awaken to danger only when in neutral territory. This stops your attacking force from waking up each turn outside an enemy city or your defenders inside friendly territory.

TEXT.French: PreChop Forests
TEXT.German: Warten vor Abholzung
TEXT.Italian: Disboscamento incompleto
TEXT.Spanish: PreChop Forests

TEXT.English: When checked, Workers ordered to chop a forest will stop with 1 turn remaining. Issue the order again to finish the chop.
TEXT.French: When checked, Workers ordered to chop a forest will stop with 1 turn remaining. Issue the order again to finish the chop.
TEXT.German: Stoppt Bautrupps, die die Aktion "Wald abholzen" ausführen, 1 Runde, bevor die Aktion beendet wird, und lässt sie auf einen weiteren Befehl warten
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, i Lavoratori a cui è stato ordinato di tagliare una Foresta si fermeranno quando mancherà un turno al completamento dell'incarico. Per terminare il disboscamento è necessario impartire nuovamente l'ordine.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, Workers ordered to chop a forest will stop with 1 turn remaining. Issue the order again to finish the chop.

TEXT.French: PreChop Improvements
TEXT.German: Warten vor Fertigstellung
TEXT.Italian: Miglioramento con disboscamento incompleto
TEXT.Spanish: PreChop Improvements

TEXT.English: When checked, Workers ordered to build an improvement that will remove a forest will stop with 1 turn remaining. Issue the order again to finish the improvement.
TEXT.French: When checked, Workers ordered to build an improvement that will remove a forest will stop with 1 turn remaining. Issue the order again to finish the improvement.
TEXT.German: Stoppt Bautrupps, die eine Modernisierung auf einem Wald-Geländefeld errichten und diesen damit entfernen würden, 1 Runde, bevor die Aktion beendet wird, und lässt sie auf einen weiteren Befehl warten
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, i Lavoratori a cui è stato ordinato di tagliare una Foresta e successivamente costruire un miglioramento si fermeranno quando mancherà un turno al completamento dell'incarico. Per terminare la costruzione è necessario impartire nuovamente l'ordine.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, Workers ordered to build an improvement that will remove a forest will stop with 1 turn remaining. Issue the order again to finish the improvement.

TEXT.French: Partial Builds
TEXT.German: Unvollständige Bauten
TEXT.Italian: Costruzione parziale
TEXT.Spanish: Construcción Parcial

TEXT.English: When checked, hovering over a plot that has partially-completed builds (improvements, routes, and chops) will show how many worker turns are required to complete them as long as your workers can actually do so.
TEXT.French: When checked, hovering over a plot that has partially-completed builds (improvements, routes, and chops) will show how many worker turns are required to complete them as long as your workers can actually do so.
TEXT.German: Zeigt, wenn der Mauszeiger über ein Geländefeld mit teilweise fertig gestellten Bauten (Modernisierungen, Straßen und Waldrodungen) bewegt wird, an, wie viele Runden ein Bautrupp noch benötigt, um sie fertig zu stellen, wenn der Bautrupp diese Aktionen beherrscht
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, posizionare il cursore su una casella che contiene costruzioni (miglioramenti, strade, eccetera) parzialmente completate mostrerà quanti turni di lavoro sono necessari per completare l'opera.
TEXT.Spanish: Dejar el ratón sobre una casilla con mejoras no terminadas mostarará el número de turnos necesarios para terminar.
